TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Supply, transport and installation of mattresses, pillows and bedding for the educational — Correctional Institution Tetovo, Brvenica Municipality and Penal —Correctional Institution Idrizovo, Gazi Baba Municipality, Skopje

LOCATION.P: Educational – Correctional Institution Tetovo, Brvenica Municipality and Penal —Correctional Institution Idrizovo, Gazi Baba Municipality, Skopje. The exact place of delivery is provided in the technical specifications of the procurement documentation

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: The selected most favourable bidder needs to provide the provision of a good performance guarantee in amount of 10 % of the contract value (including VAT).
The guarantee shall be submitted in the form of a bank guarantee in writing. The guarantee should be submitted in original form. Copies shall not be accepted.

The guarantee for the good performance shall be valid until completion of the contract. The Contracting Authority, having selected the most favourable bidder, shall additionally establish the guarantee validity period.
The bank guarantee for the good performance guarantee shall be in MKD.
The guarantee for the good performance must be issued by a bank.
The most favourable Bidder shall submit the good performance guarantee within 5 days of signing the contract.
The good performance guarantee shall be submitted within the established period, as follows: by mail or in person to the contact person from the tender documentation.

Payment under the good performance guarantee shall be collected if the selected most favourable bidder Fails to meet any of the obligations of the public procurement contract within the maturity date, by informing the selected most favourable bidder in writing regarding the same. If payment is collected under the good performance guarantee, the Contracting Authority shall announce a negative eference to the ESPP. The selected most favourable bidder may initiate proceedings in front of a competent court for payment of the bank guarantee for contract quality performance and publishing of negative reference through the Electronic system for Public procurement.

If the public procurement contract has been fully implemented in accordance with what has been agreed, the bank guarantee for good performance guarantee shall be returned by the Contracting Authority to the selected most favourable bidder within 14 days of the full contract implementation.

The good performance guarantee shall be returned by the selected most favourable Bidder by mail, in person at the economic operator’s business seat or in person at the Contracting Authority’s business seat.

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Payment upon complete realization of the object of procurement, and upon delivery of an invoice within 20 days.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to prove the personal situation, the economic operator shall also submit accompanying documentation offering proof of the following:

— Statement of the economic operator that no effective court judgment has been rendered in the past 5 years against him for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— certificate that no bankruptcy procedure has been initialized by competent authorities,
— certificate that no liquidation procedure has been initialized by competent authorities,
— certificate for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties, issued by a competent authority from the country where the economic operator has been established,

— certificate by the Register of penalties for committed criminal acts by legal entities that regarding the bidder no secondary penalty — a ban on participation in public call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and contracts for public-private partnership has been pronounced,

— certificate by the Register of penalties for committed criminal acts by legal entities that regarding the bidder no secondary penalty – temporary or permanent interdiction to exercise particular activity has been imposed,

— certificate that no misdemeanor sanction — interdiction on exercising a profession, activity or responsibility, i.e. temporary interdiction to carry out particular activity, has been imposed with an effective court judgment.

In order to prove its capacity to exercise its professional activity, the economic operator shall submit a document of registered business activity as a proof that it has been registered as physical or legal entity for exercising the business activity related to the object of the public procurement contract or a proof that it belongs to a respective professional association pursuant to the regulations in the country it has been registered in.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The Contracting Authority shall use electronic auction as the final phase of the open procedure. The subject of the auction is the overall price including all costs and discounts and import duties, without VAT. The initial price in the electronic auction is the lowest price of all acceptable tenders proposed in the initial phase of the procedure.

The invitations for participation in the auction shall be distributed electronically through the ESPP, following a full evaluation of initial tenders, to all economic operators that have submitted acceptable tenders in the first phase of the procedure and are registered in the ESPP.
The invitation to participate in the auction shall be sent electronically to the user’s profile e- mail address at the ESPP, to the person which shall submit tender for the appropriate procedure.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: The Ministry of Justice — Directorate for Execution of Sanctions, located on "Dimitrie Chupovski" nº 9, 1000 Skopje,The Republic of Macedonia

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Each interested party may participate at the public tender opening.
Only authorized representatives of the bidders may participate in the procedure of public opening of tenders by giving their comments in the minutes of tender opening.

At the public opening, the authorized representatives of the economic operators must have an authorization signed by the responsible person of the economic operator. All authorized representatives of the economic operators present at the public opening should sign an evident list.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: This procedure shall be conducted using electronic means of the Electronic system for Public procurement (ESPP) (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk).

More detailed information regarding the use of electronic means: In order to be able to participate in the electronic auction, it is necessary to register at the ESPP and to provide digital certificate. The economic operator shall register at the ESPP by filing the registration form which makes an integral part of the ESPP, after which, the ESPP shall automatically process the data from the registration form, shall generate a code and submit such code to the registered electronic mail of the economic operator. More information regarding the method of registration and use of the system can be found at the ESPP “User manual for economic operators”, which can be downloaded from the home page of the ESPP website under the section “Economic operators”.

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State Appeals Commission for Public Procurement
